name: Knife Fruit Challenge
description:
Packed with lots of intense and juicy levels, "Knife Fruit Challenge" will test your reactions and reward the most skilled fruit masters with amazing and powerful knives. Aim for the perfect cut and collect enough coins to complete all the challenges!

◉ 6+ knives with amazing designs (more coming soon)
◉ Unique game mechanics with exciting isometric graphics.
◉ One touch gameplay so you can play anytime, anywhere.
◉ Achievements and daily rewards.
◉ Free download & Game center to compete with your friends

Easy to learn but definitely difficult to master. Tap anywhere to throw a knife; hit the fruits, not the dynamites! How far can you go?

Exclusively for iOS!
